item.title: UofTCTF 2026: Challenges & Writeups
item.description: My write-up for some challenges from UofTCTF 2026, covering Web, Forensics, and Misc.

item.title: About me
item.description:
Hey, thanks for stopping by.‚ÄºÔ∏è

My name is Doan Duy Phuc. You can call me “Cu√Ωt”. I’m studying Information Security at PTIT (Posts and Telecommunications Institute of Technology) in Hanoi, Vietnam.
I also spend a questionable amount of time breaking things that were definitely not designed to be broken that way. ü´†

I enjoy playing CTFs, and among all categories, I’m most interested in Web and Forensics. I‚Äôm still learning, still making mistakes, and still spending more time than I’d like figuring out why something didn’t work the way I expected.
CTFs are mostly a way for me to practice and explore things hands-on, and over time, I‚Äôm working toward becoming an aspiring Web Pentester ‚Äî one bug, one failed exploit, and one late night at a time.
